Package ojc.ahni.hyperneat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain
    Constructs a Bain neural network from a chromosome using the ES-HyperNEAT encoding scheme (see Risi S.
    GridNet  
    HyperNEATConfiguration
    Extension of NEAT configuration with HyperNEAT-specific features added: Forces correct number of inputs and outputs according to the number required for the CPPN in the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated. Adds required hidden nodes to the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated if HyperNEATTranscriber.HYPERNEAT_LEO_LOCALITY is enabled.
    HyperNEATEvolver
    Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.
    HyperNEATFitnessFunction
    Provides a base for fitness functions for use with HyperNEAT.
    HyperNEATTargetFitnessFunction
    Given a set of genotypes that encode a neural network, and a set of training examples consisting of input and target (desired) output pattern pairs, determines fitness based on how close the output of the network encoded by each genome is to the target output given some input.
    HyperNEATTranscriber<T extends Activator>
    To "transcribe" is to construct a phenotype from a genotype.
    HyperNEATTranscriberBain
    Constructs a Bain neural network from a chromosome using the hypercube (from HyperNEAT) encoding scheme.
    HyperNEATTranscriberGridNet
    Constructs a GridNet neural network from a chromosome using the hypercube (from HyperNEAT) encoding scheme.
    Run
    This is the main class from which experiment runs are performed.
